title: Designing Student Attrition Reduction Strategies for Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and science knowledge at or above secondary level
context.additional_context: Science education course for professionals conducted in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to maintain a weekly dropout rate of 15% or less in online science courses within three months.
Through data-driven analysis, learners optimize instructional design and facilitation of discourse structures.
Learners can design triggering events to engage over 80% of learners in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
